text: Is there any plane to implement the security of protocol spec for the sawtooth, like  membership services of fabric?

Transaction families often have their own permissioning.  Authorizations happen on the chain.  Did you have a certain kind of mechanism in mind that you don't see in e.g. Marketplace?  I don't recall fabric's system assumes there's a central authority.
<@U1ZUSJHAA> I commented on the PR. I think we need something different to fix the issue.
